title: Clean, modern & cool hotel
text:
Super happy with my stay at CitizenM. Great staff, my daughter got a surprise visit 1st day ever in NYC with a small teddy bear, a personally written card and balloons. She was absolutely thrilled, so sweet (and she has kept the mementos). Often boutique hotels come across as dark and gloomy (but luxurious), CitizenM managed to give a light and airy feel and still portray boutique style. The rooms are small, but cleverly planned and unlike many hotells it felt very clean. Everything has a cool twist such as the printed comments on pillows, on toilet accessories, Quote: s on the corridor walls etc. Great hotel!
